meanings.sent1: The fresh fruit was uncorrupt and delicious.
meanings.sent2: The uncorrupt water from the mountain stream tasted pure.
meanings.sent3: The uncorrupt book was a joy to read without any missing pages.
meanings.sent4: Her uncorrupt smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The uncorrupt air in the forest was invigorating.

meanings.sent1: The uncorrupt judge made fair decisions in court.
meanings.sent2: An uncorrupt leader is essential for a just society.
meanings.sent3: The uncorrupt politician gained the trust of the people.
meanings.sent4: His uncorrupt actions spoke louder than words.
meanings.sent5: Living an uncorrupt life brings peace of mind.
